SEARCH
Package pl.edu.agh.to.przychodnia.Appointment

Class AppointmentService

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.agh.to.przychodnia.Appointment.AppointmentService
@Service public class AppointmentService extends Object
Service responsible for handling business logic related to medical appointments.

This service allows creating, deleting and retrieving appointments, as well as finding available appointment slots for a given doctor.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentService

      public AppointmentService(AppointmentRepository appointmentRepository, ScheduleRepository scheduleRepository, PatientRepository patientRepository)
      Constructs an AppointmentService with required repositories.
      Parameters:
      appointmentRepository - repository for appointments
      scheduleRepository - repository for schedules
      patientRepository - repository for patients

  • Method Details

    • createAppointment

      public GetAppointmentDTO createAppointment(CreateAppointmentDTO appointmentDTO)
      Creates a new appointment for a given patient and schedule.

      The appointment lasts 15 minutes. If the selected time slot is already taken, an exception is thrown.

      Parameters:
      appointmentDTO - DTO containing appointment creation data
      Returns:
      created appointment as DTO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if patient or schedule does not exist
      IllegalStateException - if the appointment slot is already taken

    • getAllAppointments

      public List<String> getAllAppointments()
      Retrieves all appointments as string representations.
      Returns:
      list of appointment strings

    • deleteAppointment

      public Boolean deleteAppointment(int id)
      Deletes an appointment with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - appointment identifier
      Returns:
      true if appointment existed and was deleted, false otherwise

    • getFreeDoctorAppointments

      public List<DoctorsAppointmentsDTO> getFreeDoctorAppointments(int doctorID, LocalDateTime date)
      Returns a list of free appointment slots for a given doctor within the next 7 days starting from the provided date.

      Appointments are divided into 15-minute slots.

      Parameters:
      doctorID - identifier of the doctor
      date - starting date for searching available slots
      Returns:
      list of available doctor appointment slots
